January 30, IS59
Dr. Maurice F. Seay, Director
Division of Education
W. K. Kellogg Foundation
250 Champion Street
Battle Creek, Michigan
Dear Maurice:
Attached is the special project request we were invited to present to
the W. K. Kellogg Foundation for its consideration. This is the project
which was discussed with you in person by Mr. Schooley, Mr. Hull
and the undersigned at the time ox our last visit to the Foundation on
September 24.
It is submitted in this preliminary form, in accordance with our recent
telephone conversation, in order that it may be fully discussed and
possibly revised, before final consideration is given to it.
For tills reason it is also presented in some detail, and duplicated
copies are being made. In case the Foundation wished to call a meetÂ¬
ing of educators to consider it, or to refer it to others who may be less
familiar with the NAEB than you are, it was our belief that this more
comprehensive statement might be useful. 1/Ve shall be glad to provide
additional copies if they are desired.
We are most grateful to the W. K. Kellogg Foundation for the privilege
of presenting this request at this time. We would be glad to provide
any other information required for its consideration at any time.
Sincerely,
